text:
The Template GUI manager currently silently overwrites files.

As well as fixing this it would be useful to allow templates to be merged if they are not entire test plans.

Complete test plans need to be treated like a Load, except the file name should not be set up because the template should be treated as read-only.

Partial test plans should be treated like a Merge.
creator: sebb@apache.org
